alert.note: Alert for Boone; Campbell; Kenton; Pendleton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 21 at 8:14PM EDT until September 21 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Kenton County in northern Kentucky... Campbell County in northern Kentucky... Southern Boone County in northern Kentucky... Northern Pendleton County in northern Kentucky... * Until 900 PM EDT. * At 814 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Walton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Covington, Florence, Independence, Erlanger, Alexandria, Elsmere, Walton, Claryville, Union, Crittenden, Butler, Ryland Heights, Mentor, Moscow, California, Mount Auburn, Visalia, Atwood, Richwood and Grants Lick. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
